bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Illness Sign of an uncomfortable feeling of dryness in the eyes with dim-sightedness. Tai ping sheng hui fang 太平聖惠方 31: 治骨蒸，五心煩熱，眼目昏澀，肢節酸疼，不能飲食，宜服升 麻散方 , “To cure bone steaming, vexing heat affecting the five centers (i.e. the two palm centers, the two food sole centers, the abdominal center), clouding with roughness in the eyes, sour pain in one’s limbs and joints, failure to drink and eat, the recipe to ingest the powder with sheng ma is advisable”.
